oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - 1951-01-22 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recordings of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), and Audrey Williams (performer), one on January 22, 1951 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Audrey Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams and Louis Buck talk and introduces the first tune -- Seaman's Blues (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams introduces Audrey Williams -- Blues In My Mind (Audrey Williams) -- Hank Willilams introduces the next tune -- Something Got Hold Of Me (Audrey Williams and Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Louis Buck and Hank Williams) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Audrey, 1923-1975;
